verses.text: \w Brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G3754"\w* \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w zeal|strong="G2205"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w knowing|strong="G0050"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w* \w to|strong="G2212"\w* \w establish|strong="G2476"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w*, \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* submitted \w themselves|strong="G2398"\w* \w to|strong="G2212"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, unto \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G4100"\w* believeth.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G0444"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, speaketh \w thus|strong="G3779"\w*: \w Say|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* thy \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w ascend|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*? \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G2609"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w down|strong="G2609"\w*;

\w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w descend|strong="G2597"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* deep? \w that|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w bring|strong="G0321"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w again|strong="G1519"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* saith \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scripture|strong="G3004"\w*? \w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* nigh thee, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* thy \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*. \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* thou \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* thy \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, thou shalt \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w*, \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w we|strong="G1161"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* unto \w justice|strong="G1343"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w*, \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*, confession \w is|strong="G2588"\w* \w made|strong="G3670"\w* unto \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* saith: Whosoever believeth \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, shall \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* confounded.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w distinction|strong="G1293"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Greek|strong="G1672"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w over|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w rich|strong="G4147"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w call|strong="G1941"\w* \w upon|strong="G1510"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* whosoever \w shall|strong="G2962"\w* \w call|strong="G1941"\w* upon \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2962"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w shall|strong="G0191"\w* \w they|strong="G3767"\w* \w call|strong="G1941"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G3739"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3767"\w* \w have|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*? \w Or|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w shall|strong="G0191"\w* \w they|strong="G3767"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w him|strong="G3739"\w*, \w of|strong="G0191"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3767"\w* \w have|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w shall|strong="G0191"\w* \w they|strong="G3767"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w a|strong="G0191"\w* \w preacher|strong="G2784"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* shall \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w unless|strong="G1437"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w be|strong="G0018"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w it|strong="G1437"\w* \w is|strong="G0018"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w*: \w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w beautiful|strong="G5611"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w of|strong="G4228"\w* \w them|strong="G0649"\w* \w that|strong="G5613"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2097"\w* \w of|strong="G4228"\w* peace, \w of|strong="G4228"\w* \w them|strong="G0649"\w* \w that|strong="G5613"\w* \w bring|strong="G2097"\w* glad tidings \w of|strong="G4228"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w things|strong="G0018"\w*!

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w do|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* Isaias saith: \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w our|strong="G3956"\w* \w report|strong="G0189"\w*?

\w Faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w then|strong="G1161"\w* cometh \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Have|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*? \w Yes|strong="G0235"\w*, verily, \w their|strong="G0846"\w* sound hath \w gone|strong="G1831"\w* \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w ends|strong="G4009"\w* \w of|strong="G1093"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G3625"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*: Hath \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w known|strong="G1097"\w*? \w First|strong="G4413"\w*, \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* saith: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1484"\w* \w provoke|strong="G3949"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w jealousy|strong="G3863"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w that|strong="G1097"\w* which \w is|strong="G3004"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*; \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* \w foolish|strong="G0801"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1484"\w* \w anger|strong="G3949"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* Isaias \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w bold|strong="G0662"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* saith: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G2147"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w did|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w appeared|strong="G1096"\w* openly \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G2147"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* saith: \w All|strong="G3650"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w long|strong="G2250"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* spread \w my|strong="G3004"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w a|strong="G3004"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* believeth \w not|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* contradicteth \w me|strong="G3004"\w*.
